Description.Text: Showcasing musically-themed artwork throughout the property, Buckingham Hotel New York is a haven for art lovers and is surrounded by attractions that pay tribute to all forms of art and music. Museum Of Modern Art, dedicated to contemporary art is one such popular attraction. Rockefeller Center, which houses the Radio City Music Hall and The Frick Collection, a museum with European paintings are other places of interest that worth a visit. Guests can also visit Chrysler Building, a skyscraper built in Art Deco style.

• Carnegie Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • Tiffany & Co. - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • Museum of Modern Art - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi • American Folk Art Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi • Museum of Television and Radio - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Broadway - 1 km / 0.6 mi • Times Square - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Empire State Building - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi • Central Park - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi • Ellis Island - 9 km / 5.6 mi • Statue of Liberty - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi

Air-conditioned guestrooms at Buckingham Hotel offer CD players, in-room safes (accommodate laptops), and coffee/tea makers. Televisions come with cable channels and DVD/VCRs. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) is provided along with cordless phones and complimentary weekday newspapers. Accommodations at this 3.0-star property have kitchens with refrigerators, stovetops, microwaves, and cookware/dishes/utensils. Bathrooms include shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Rooms also include clock radios. Cribs (infant beds) are also available. Housekeeping is provided. All guestrooms are non-smoking.

Buckingham Hotel features a sauna and a fitness facility. Business-related amenities at this 3.0-star property include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), dial-up Internet access (surcharge), and a business center. This New York property provides an airport shuttle (surcharge). This property also offers a concierge desk, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities.
• Running track/path • Bicycle rentals • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding • Playground
Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Nearby Restaurants: • Burger Joint at Le • Topaz Thai • Rue 57 • Angelo's Pizza • Norma's at Le Parker • Russian Tea Room • Nino's Tuscany • Jekyll & Hyde Club • BLT Market • Seppi's Restaurant
Providing every comfort and amenity at a reasonable rate makes Buckingham Hotel an excellent choice for your stay
